remarks: Commutative/associative law for commutative rings.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)
statement:
crngm.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
crngm.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
crngm.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
crngm4 $p |- ( ( R e. CRingOps /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( C e. X /\ D e. X ) ) -> ( ( A H B ) H ( C H D ) ) = ( ( A H C ) H ( B H D ) ) ) $.
